name: Paint Game (Egasuas)
description:
Made for the Metroidvania Month XV game jam although has no metroidvania elements in it.

While we had a big team we unfortunately didn't get everyone's work into the project, the end result isn't representative of the amount of work people did and the amount of assets they created that went unused, this was a fun learning experience for us all and we're proud of the time we've spent working together. Despite being unable to get some people's work into the project they still deserve credit for being a part of this project.
